text: James Jonathan Slater (born 27 October 1968) is a Welsh former professional footballer who played as a forward. He made appearances in the English Football League for Wrexham, all of them as a substitute. He also played for Lex XI. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Welsh footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Wrexham A.F.C. players Category:Lex XI F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:Footballers from Wrexham
title: Jamie Slater
